content.rendered:
Here’s our latest news - including our featured launch in Zone 1 London, exciting progress in Dubai, new team members and more investor content than ever before.

Featured Launch: The Halo, Oval Village

The Halo at Oval Village is a landmark development in Zone 1 London. Set within the iconic Gas Holder structure, this unique project by Berkeley offers 199 premium apartments and an exclusive viewing terrace overlooking The Kia Oval.

This launch is especially meaningful for Chris and Tom, who both played for Surrey at The Kia Oval during their professional cricket careers.

🎥 Watch Ollie’s presentation on Berkeley, The Halo overview, floor plans and next steps here.

Source in Dubai

This quarter, we successfully launched investment opportunities in Dubai, with Tom on the ground in January meeting developers, investors and visiting sites.

More opportunities are coming soon - plus, an exclusive London-based event for investors, which will be announced in the next few weeks.

Live: Our New Website

We’ve launched our brand-new website – designed to reflect everything we offer investors across their property investment journey.

Explore our solutions, meet the team and get in touch on our new and improved website.

Meet the New Team Members

A warm welcome to the latest additions to The Home Cloud’s Lettings & Management team:

  • Beth Waddon – Property Manager
  • Ellie Atkins – Junior Property Manager
  • Anais Payne – Lettings Administrator

They’re here to ensure a smooth and seamless experience for all our landlords and tenants.

We’re on YouTube!

Subscribe to our new YouTube channel for our full Buy-to-Let Essentials series, in-depth property podcasts, market insights and more.

Whether you’re a first-time investor or building your portfolio, find the video for you here.

Follow Along on Instagram!

Make sure you're following Tom and Ollie on Instagram for their behind-the-scenes updates and real-time insights into the world of property investment.

Follow Tom: @tom_zentrohomes

Follow Ollie: @ollie_zentrohomes

 

That's all for now.

Please get in touch with the team to discuss your property investment journey.  

 
Contact Us
